snippet: A crucial issue is that whenever a state offers an incentive for a company to build a factory, the economic stimulus is rarely concentrated in the surrounding area.
abstract: Experts in industrial development question true economic benefits to Nevada from luring Tesla Motors to build giant battery factory; crucial issue is that whenever state offers incentive for company to build factory, economic stimulus is rarely concentrated in surrounding area.
lead_paragraph: A crucial issue is that whenever a state offers an incentive for a company to build a factory, the economic stimulus is rarely concentrated in the surrounding area.

headline.main: Nevada Woos Tesla Plant in Tax Deal, but Economic Benefits Prompt Debate
headline.print_headline: Nevada Woos Tesla Plant in Tax Deal, but Economic Benefits Prompt Debate
